description: Output bare issue ID only, enabling scripting patterns like id=$(bw create "Fix bug" --silent). Useful for piping into other commands without parsing human-readable output.

comments.text: Added --silent flag to create command. When set, outputs only the bare issue ID (e.g. bw-abc1) with no other text, enabling scripting patterns like id=$(bw create 'Fix bug' --silent). Silent takes precedence over --json. Added two tests: TestCmdCreateSilent verifies bare ID output and absence of human-readable text, TestCmdCreateSilentNoExtraOutput verifies single-line output with correct prefix. All tests pass.

title: Add --silent flag to create
